New GOSTs for bread come into force in Russia

01 Nov 2019, 20:34

New GOSTs for bread come into force in Russia
20:34 11.01.2019 Photo: pixabay.com0
Now it is impossible to make bread from flour of "general purpose" - for compound feed. In the new GOSTs, manufacturers of bakery products should use exclusively baking flour.


In the new GOSTs for bread, the use of general purpose flour is not provided


On November 1, 2019, new state standards for bakery products from wheat and rye flour entered into force in the Russian Federation.

What is wrong with the old GOST? According to the head of the certification department of the Federal Center for Grain Quality Assessment Galina Kulakova, they allowed the use of so-called “general purpose” flour for bread production, which in its main parameters is inferior to high-quality flour, as it is made from wheat intended for the production of animal feed.
“General-purpose flour bread has lower quality, but consumers may not notice this, because manufacturers use a variety of improvers - the latter provide the necessary porosity, elasticity, volume, and so on. Of course, the use of general-purpose flour reduces the quality of bread, because in itself such flour implies worse quality, and no improvers can fix it, ”Kulakova said.
In the new GOSTs for bread, the use of general purpose flour is not provided for - manufacturers of bakery products should use exclusively baking flour. However, experts are sure that the new state standards for bread will not protect Russians from bread with various additives.
